name: Flying Aggravated Animals
description:
most art from opengameart.org
arrow

It's basically angry birds :D

has some unique mechanics developed myself

this is my first unity game please do not judge :(

HIT R TO RESET

for people who have never heard of the hit game angry birds and for people who have no common sense:

drag the bird and release it to launch it at the enemies. 

enemies can be killed by touching the bird or by crates falling onto their heads

metal crates are very heavy and are almost impossible to move

flying enemies... well fly

levels 7+8 are anti-gravity

stone enemies can only be killed by falling crates
